sourcing.instructions: - Chromium(IV) oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: - Chromium(IV) oxide: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. Measure out 240 g of Chromium(IV) oxide and place in a clean, dry mixing bowl.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 240 g of Chromium(IV) oxide and place in a clean, dry mixing bowl.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture into a heat-resistant ceramic container.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture into a heat-resistant ceramic container.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the container to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow the container to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 2 hours).

steps: 1. Remove the cooled solid from the container.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the cooled solid from the container.
